artist: Toyohara  Chikanobu; Published by Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: triptych, three sheets attached and folded in album: ornately decorated shrine with procession of ornately dressed male figures in red and black emerging from gate; other male spectators kneeling
marks: Signature, Title, and Seals Signed LLQ of R sheet: Yo_shu_ Kunichika | Title U
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: The Scene of the First Visit to Zo_jo_ji Temple of the Year
